tool.name: FetchLandsatGeomedData

param.name: in_extent
param.dialogReference:
The extent of the imagery that will be downloaded.

An extent no greater than 100 x 100 km is recommended.

param.name: out_nc
param.dialogReference: The NetCDF (i.e., data cube) containing the downloaded imagery.

param.name: in_collections
param.expression: Landsat 5 TM | Landsat 7 ETM+ | Landsat 8 & 9 OLI
param.dialogReference:
Specifies the name(s) of the DEA collection to consider for download.

At least one is required.

param.name: in_assets
param.expression: Blue | Green | Red | NIR | SWIR 1 | SWIR 2 | EMAD | SMAD | BCMAD | Count
param.dialogReference:
Specifies the name(s) of the DEA assets (i.e., bands) to consider for download.

At least one is required.

param.name: in_remove_slc_off
param.dialogReference: Specifies whether Landsat 7 ETM+ imagery captured after the SLC failure on 31/05/2003 will be excluded from download.

param.name: in_srs
param.expression: GDA94 Australia Albers (EPSG: 3577) | WGS84 Pseudo-Mercator (EPSG: 3857) | WGS84 (EPSG: 4326)
param.dialogReference: Specifies the output spatial reference system used to project downloaded imagery.

param.name: in_res
param.dialogReference: Specifies the output spatial resolution used to resample the downloaded imagery.

param.name: in_max_threads
param.dialogReference:
The maximum number of threads allowed when downloading data.

Leaving this parameter blank will set the optimal number of threads automatically.

tool.summary:
Access DEA's Landsat Surface Reflectance Geometric Median and Median Absolute Deviation (GeoMAD) Collection 3 Analysis Ready Data (ARD) product. This product uses Geometric Median and Median Absolute Deviation statistical techniques to provide information on variance in imagery in a given year. They provide insight into the "average" annual surface reflectance and variation within a given extent and are useful for providing spectrally-robust annual snapshots without downloading the full DEA dataset.

The Landsat GeoMAD Collection 3 offers annual NBART-corrected images for Landsat 5 Thematic Mapper (TM), Landsat 7 Enhanced Thematic Mapper Plus (ETM+) and Landsat 8 and 9 Operational Land Imager (OLI) imagery captured since 1986 for the entirety of Australia. The following collections and their associated metadata are outlined below:

  • Landsat 5 TM (ga_ls5t_gm_cyear_3) NBART (link).

  • Landsat 7 ETM+ (ga_ls7e_gm_cyear_3) NBART (link).

  • Landsat 8 OLI (ga_ls8cls9c_gm_cyear_3) NBART (link).

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Tool development by Lewis Trotter and Todd Robinson with Curtin University, Western Australia. Data provided by Digital Earth Australia.
